dct_title_s: A Plan of the attack of Fort Sulivan, the key of Charlestown, in South Carolina, on the 28th. of June 1776. By His Majesty's squadron, commanded by Sir Peter Parker
dct_description_sm: Oriented with north to the right. British squadron represented pictorially. In lower margin: The following description of the attack of Fort Sulivan, was received in a letter from Sir Peter Parker to Mr. Stephens, Secretary of the Admiralty.
dct_publisher_sm: London, Printed for Robt. Sayer & Jno. Bennett, 1776.
dct_subject_sm: Fort Moultrie, Battle of, S.C., 1776—Maps, Manuscript—Early works to 1800
dcat_theme_sm: Fort Moultrie, Battle of, S.C., 1776—Maps, Manuscript—Early works to 1800
